QuestData.Title: Tactical Mana Bombs
QuestData.Description: Ah, $p, just the $r I was looking for. I have received another batch of tactical mana bombs that I need planted in key positions across Dawnseeker Promontory to the northwest.$b$bHere, take these. It is time to give the Sunreavers a taste of their own medicine.$b$bPlant one on the Sunreaver ships, another one on their scrying crystals, and the last on the bridge that connects to their forward base.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Tactical Mana Bomb on a Sunreaver ship, the Scrying Crystals, and on the most inland bridge of Dawnseeker Promontory.
